participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys capturing moments through photography and teaching children.
participant_1.background: I am fluent in English, Spanish, and French. I am an elementary school teacher. My boyfriend and I are moving into an apartment together next week. I'm interested in photography and like taking pictures.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and social, enjoys cars and spending time at the gym, but struggles with commitment in relationships.
participant_2.background: I like to spend my money on cars. I go to the gym most days just to socialize. I work from home. I watch too much TV in my spare time. I have never had a steady relationship.

content.text: Alright mate? I love photography and photography. I love taking pictures and photography.
